res.rBody: Erat namque in sermone verax in iudicio iustus in consilio providus in bonitate conspicuus in universa morum honestate praeclarus

verses.vBody:
In commisso In quo misso in comissu quoque fidelis
in interventu interventu in interventus strenuus
